alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Nash (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Vance, Warren, northwestern Nash, west central Halifax and Franklin Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Louisburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Louisburg, Warrenton, Norlina, Bunn, Castalia, Middleburg, Macon, Centerville and Ingleside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
